    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Učenje iz besedila</string>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Večina učencev se ob srečanju z besedilom v učbeniku (spoznavanje narave, spoznavanje družbe‚ ...) sooči z besedilom, ki ga mora prebirati z razumevanjem in se tudi naučiti snov, ki jo besedilo obravnava. Naloga, ki jo predstavljam, omogoča postopno utrjevanje branja z razumevanjem.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple exercise in reading comprehension - build your own riddle about chosen keyword regarding the given text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naloga</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bralno razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">utrjevanje</string>
            <string language="en">drill</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">učenje</string>
            <string language="en">learning</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Übung im Leseerfassen - bauen Sie Ihr 
eigenes Rätsel über das gewählte Schlüsselwort betreffend ist den 
gegebenen Text auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice simple dans la compréhension de lecture
- établissez votre propre énigme sur le mot-clé choisi concernant 
le texte donné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício simples na compreensão da leitura - 
construa seu próprio riddle sobre o keyword escolhido a respeito do 
texto dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione semplice nella comprensione della 
lettura - sviluppi il vostro proprio riddle circa la parola chiave 
scelta per quanto riguarda il dato testo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή άσκηση στην κατανόηση ανάγνωσης - χτίστε το 
αίνιγμά σας για την επιλεγμένη λέξη κλειδί σχετικά με το 
δεδομένο κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio simple en la comprensión de la lectura
- construya su propia criba sobre la palabra clave elegida con 
respecto al texto dado.</string>
          </description>
